params._body: - the body text of the announcement post
params._pin: - true if post should is pinned to the top of the UI, false otherwise
params._title: - the title text of the announcement post

returns._nonce: - the nonce of the announcement on-chain

params._nonce: - the index of the announcement to query internally

returns._body: - the body text of the announcement post
returns._pinned: - true if the announcement is pinned, false otherwise
returns._timecode: - UNIX timestamp on Ethereum when the announcement was committed
returns._title: - the title text of the announcement post

params._nonce: - the index of the announcement to set as pinned within the contract

getAnnouncement(uint256).notice: Get all data regarding a specific announcement

getAnnouncements().notice: Get every announcement added to the platform

pinAnnouncement(uint256).notice: Pin a specific announcement to the top of the UI
